text: Soni pati gasoomedwe kukwao ma Ȃya Getu gakupikanika chenene, aŵala ŵangaakwembecheya ya kusimangana Nowe akasatiji: “Ikani najo Qur’an jangaŵaga aji, kapena n’jigalausye.” Jilani: “Nganiyiŵa kukwangu yanti mpaka najigalausye mwakusaka kwangu, ngangukuya ikaŵeje yayikuuwulidwa kukwangu, chisimu une ngogopa ilagasyo ya lisiku lyekulungwa naga nanyosye Ambuje ŵangu.”
